Wow.  I just beat this game and I have to say it has the best story of any Bioshock.  The narrative is just so polished in it's pacing, delivery, and tone.  Everything about the story is a vast improvement over the the original Bioshock and that ending that just seemed slapped on.  The story in Infinite builds to a crescendo and ends perfectly.  I can't recommend it higher.

Gorgeous visuals coupled with average gameplay. The story is merely average until you get to the admittedly great ending.

Buy if it's 75% off.
Play This Game

This game offers and amazing setting, plot, and gameplay. The negative is that it ends. For myself, a good story can really move a game forward for me. This game does just that. The only thing I would like to add, and this is nitpicking, is that I wish your decisions did more in the game and that more were offered. I would have liked to have chosen how things ended based on my gameplay as in the first Bioshock. Other than that, this installment of the franchise provides the amazing twist at the end you come to expect.
Have you played this game? If not, WHY NOT?! This game is spectacular. I enjoyed every aspect of this game.

Regarding the game itself, what other reviews say it's true both good and bad. If you want my opinion this is it:
Imagine a 90 year old man who owns a $150K custom made Viper. He can't drive it, he won't let anyone drive it or even come close to it. He pays a fortune to a mechanic to keep it maintained and in full working order, top notch and HE CAN'T even drive it to test it. That's what bioshock infinite is to me a HUGE waste of god-awesome potential.

I wanted the game they showed in the first trailers. So I wanted $1 million worth of platinum and instead I got $1 million worth of gold. Both awesome and equal worth but...... I wanted the platinum.
The remove a lot of awesome features and stuff to replace it with a lot of OTHER awesome features and stuff, again, I was hoping/waiting for the original set of awesome features (i.e: how elizabeth was more proactive support in earlier versions instead of being passive support, which is awesome too [why not both tho?])

I am personally dissapointed because I did not receive what I expected but I still got an AWESOME freaking game. It is the reason why I am even writting this review. I am so passionate about how exceptional this game is and how much WASTED potential it has that makes me mad how Irrational games did not take advantage of it. Instead make way for DLC featuring shit from our earlier and FAR better and FAR more successful game in Rapture. Really? in order to unf*ck yourselves you need Andrew Ryan's help from the previous game to please your fans? NO! Infinite has litterally INFINITE potential on its own. The story is FAR from over. If you need help with this, ask the Luteces. 
( I would love to see a DLC where they show, for example, the alternate universe where booker joins the vox. That is litterally 1 new hole game right there)

HELLO!!!!!!!!!!!!!?????? ANYONE THERE???!!!

Thank you and excuse my language and passion for this wonderful game.
Can't recommend this game enough.  The gameplay is a ton of fun, and the story is one of the best experiences I have had while gaming.  Holy crap.

Ah, Bioshock Infinite. One of the biggest games of last year as I'm sure you can all recall. If you havn't already bought it (or looked up the ending) buy it. It's storyline is one not easily forgotten, plus the A.I. doesn't just complain and whine! She complain, whines, and throws ammo/health at you! Plus exploding revolvers. Yeah. Oh right, and the world looks amazing. What with the sky and such.

Extremely well written story. I enjoyed everything about the game. The graphics are great and the characters evolve well and are extremely well written. I do not regret buying this game at all. Big recommend!
I definitely rate this game 4.5/5. The game mechanics are outstanding. The only thing that looks weird is the blood. I bought it on the steam sale after christmas, and im very pleased with it.

O que falar desse jogo? Assim como seus outros 2 antecessores que tenho-os na minha lista top 20 melhores jogos que eu já joguei não foi diferente, quando eu joguei esse jogo meu deus sua trilha sonora, gráficos, ambientação, tudo, foi ótima sua história ela é muito complexa e você tem que prestar atenção em cada detalhe senão tu boia, comprei ele logo quando saiu, tudo bem que foi meio pesado pro meu bolso porém valeu cada centavo, então se tu curte Bio e ver esse jogo em promo compre sem pensar 2 vezes ou ate mesmo sem promo vale muito a pena pois vai valer cada centavo para tu poder ver a lindíssima Elizabeth.  Sem contar as dlcs que tu volta em Rapture, cara tu tem noção disso ?voltar em Rapture sem estar um caos é a melhor coisa ;)

The story for this game is great and the graphics are beautiful. Definitely worth a buy.

This game is brilliant, though it can be difficult to understand at first. I originally had a rather low opinion of BioShock Infinite after I played it through shortly after release. Now having completed my second playthrough, my opinion has changed substantially. The best advice for a new player is this: take it slow. Do not rush through the game, listen carefully to everything the characters say, and try your best to find ALL of the voice recordings as they add a lot to the backstory. The final sequence of the game is difficult to comprehend at first, though the developers probably could have made it a little less confusing. In the end, BioShock Infinite continues the tradition of masterful narrative set down by the previous entries in the series. I wholeheartedly recommend this game to anyone who is willing to give it the time it needs to be fully enjoyed. 4.5 / 5 stars.

Nice game, but i dont know about the replay about this game. once your played it out it might not trigger you back into it.
I do like the game but replay is low as far as i see it. Want a nice story telling story with loads of guning and other stuff this is the game for you. but otherwise not worth 30 dollars.

Another boring game wrapped in pretty wallpaper. Linear, go here go there gameplay coupled with an illusion of choice and sandbox which is nonexistant. Impressive worlddesign completely restricted by where you can go and what you can do. A game that doesn't contribute to anything.

Super Spiel :) Mein Favorit!

etwas längere Zusammenfassung:
Die wahrscheinlich schönsten Settings der Spielegeschichte, fantastische Musik und eine Story die für das Shooter Genre grandios und intelligent erzählt ist. 
Aber da komm ich auch schon zum größten Kritikpunkt, das Gameplay bzw. das Gunplay finde ich einfach nur langweilig, Die Waffen fühlen sich nicht wertig an, es gibt kaum Waffenauswahl und es macht generell einfach keinen Spaß sich durch die viel zu vielen Gegnerhorden zu schießen. 
Ich kann dabei aber auch nur betonen das dies meine Meinung ist, Nach z.B. der Meinung der GIGA-Redaktion fühlt sich die Skyhook-Mechanik gut an und das ballern soll auch viel Spaß machen. Ist halt wieder Meinungssache. 
Sonst kann ich nur sagen, ich finde es sollte auf jeden Fall durchgespielt werden, schon alleine um zu zeigen das sich auch gute Storys im Shooter Genre lohnen und die Publisher sehen das es auch andere Wege gibt als jedes Jahr den gleichen Mist zu bringen. Klar es wird jedes Jahr ein neues Call of Duty erscheinen und es wird sich auch wieder immens gut verkaufen, aber welches Spiel bleibt den Leuten dann in vielen Jahren noch in Erinnerung? Call of Duty XY oder Spiele wie Far Cry 3 oder Bioshock Infinite? Für 30 Euro kann man da nicht viel falsch machen.

My game of the year, If you haven't played it yet get on it. Out of the series it really wasn't my favorite, visually stunning but the game play was too much arcade shooting without the fear. Bioshock one and 2 were darker and were great for lights off late at night for a scare this one is suppper bright the whole game with nothing meant to really be scary. Where infinite shined was the last 15 min or so when they explained the story that was intertwined through all three games. Weather they really knew that was the explaination from the beginning it works and is pretty mind blowing like the end of inception sort of thing.

Trumped up, over thought plot line without a second thought given to game play. I felt like the gameplay in the original Bioshock was much more fluid. Another "triple-A" franchise that puts out a new game with a slight graphical upgrade with little thought to anything else except the bottom line, and the critics laud it with 10/10 reviews. What a disgrace.

This game is great. I love the art style, the atmosphere, the controls and the overall story. It is very rare to see that a game can manage and old look and old feel and still play like a modern game. A very immersive game, Bioshock infinite feels like watching a movie rather than playing a game, and the characters are both lovable and hateable. But the one character that truly stands out in the series is Elizabeth. Elizabeth was perfectly written, from her personality to her mannerisims and even her script, Elizabeth keeps you safe and happy throughout the game and is most likely what gives this game so many 10/10 scores. A truly fantastic adventure, I believe this game deserves a 9/10. Although it is a fantastic game, there are a few things that keep it from that extra point, but this is from my view, not a critic's. Get your copy now for 39.99!

Un juego excelente en todos los aspectos. 
A nivel grafico es una pasada, con ese diseño artístico que lo hace tan especial.
La banda sonora es impresionante y encaja perfectamente con el juego.
La jugabilidad es muy buena.
Y lo mejor de todo el juego, su ARGUMENTO, simplemente perfecto. Un argumento complejo e interesante desde el principio hasta el final.
Muy recomendable este Bioshock Infinite.

"Переменные и константы".
Итак, хочу вам представить BioShock Infinite - абсолютно новое, совершенно не похожее ни на какую либо другую игру, творение в области игропрома. Лично мне, как постоянному клиенту давно не хватало ощущения "кина", того ощущения в котором ты полностью погружаешься в произведение и отдаешься на волю разработчикам. По приходу новой ветки BioShock в моем сознании появляется новое понятие - "игрокартина". Дело в том, что в наше время мы редко можем увидеть взаимосвязь кина и игры, также редко вливаемся в сюжет с головой, чувствуя на себе каждую эмоцию героя. Но BioShock Infinite явилось новым веянием, сравнимое лишь со снисхождение бога на землю. Учавствуя в игре, ощущаешь свое присутствие на сцене, будто бы это ты на месте Букера Дэвитта попадаешь в историю, переплетенной секретами и тайнами. И эта роль не кажется странной, даже наоборот представляешь себя неистовым Гамлетом, рвущимся на сцену.
Элизабет - героиня Bioshock, сравнимая с многогранным алмазом, где каждую грань человек определяет сам. В нее невозможно не влюбиться. Ее красота  - не зыблема, ее душа - недостижима. Никакая другая героиня так не симпотизировала мне, как Элизабет.
Имею обязательство отметить кропотливую работу художников и аниматоров за антуражность, а также нобыкновенность мира под именем "Колумбия". Впервые увидев это, я просто не мог поверить своим глазам, настолько они меня обманывали? Моему счастью не было предела. Я был уверен, что любой человек обязан оценить этот бесспорно титанический труд. Браво! 
Приводя цепочку синонимов, относящуюся к данной игре, хотелось бы выделить несколько слов: любовь, бесчеловечность, гуманность, боль, скорбь, сожаление, двуличность, вера, надежда, одухотворенность, жизнь. Взгляните на эти слова, в каждое из них я вложил частицу своей души, о которой я не сожалею. 
Вы наверное ждете деталей, какую-либо определенную оценку элементам игры. Поймите, здесь это не имеет никакого значения. BioShock Infinite - это книга, где каждый символ, букву вы увидите по своему. Для каждого игрока - эта книга станет многозначна, но каждый смысл сыграет свою роль.

Возможно, это лучшая игра в истории. По крайне мере, точно - одна из. Достоинства, недостатки, оценки - это все не про нее. 
В нее просто должен сыграть каждый.
Awesome gameplay and hours of fun.

One of the best games I've played within the last three-four years. The story is captivating and extremely well thought out. The graphics are sublime and the sound and music sets the mood perfectly. I definetely recommend this game to everyone who enjoys immersing themselves in a great story.

IT IS SO GOOD

(brilliant story and visuals w/ v fun gameplay)

ДААААААА! Кен Левайн сотворил просто таки уникальную игру! Скажу честно во время просмотра концовки у меня просто отвалилась челюсть от происходящего. Конечно сюжет это очень сильная сторона игры, сам шутер также очень хорошо выглядит и играется просто отлично. В игре огромное количество врагов и способов их уничтожения, разные виды оружия и 8 плазмидов, плюс своеобразные "опасности" окружающего мира. Короче говоря геймплейная составляющая на высоте. Соглашусь, что Bioshock Infinite самый лучший шутер 2013 года! В этой игре класно все: история, персонажи, мир и самое главное атмосфера. К тому же Элизабет сопровождает игрока почтит все время, она не нуждается в защите и всегда готова помочь монеткой, аптечкой или же патронами. Кстати умереть невозможно: Элизабет делает волшебный укол, который полностью восстанавливает здоровье и дает небольшое количество патронов, зато отнимает немного денежек. Сам мир нуждается в отдельном описании: он, по моему мнению, намного красивее и интереснее первых двух частей. Колумбия завораживает своей красотой, в ней каждая мелочь имеет свой смысл. Вобще город имеет свой стиль, который стал этакой фишкой игры. В игре присутствует очень интересный способ передвижения на воздушных рельсах. Это смотриться очень прикольно) Подведу итоги: Bioshock Infinite - игра, обязательная к прохождению абсолютно всем, кто ценит сюжет, отличный шутер и очень красивый мир.

Che dire?Ho aspettato tanto(forse anche troppo) a giocarci ma gli sviluppatori ancora una volta hanno fatto un gran bel lavoro: la campagna è molto curata e la storia piena di sorprese, il finale è del tutto inaspettato ma incredibilmente sensato rispetto a quello che è stata la campagna. Io ho preso il pack con i primi due bioshock che avevo già giocato su console a 13.30€(coi saldi) consiglio a tutti di pensare di investire su questa serie che in 3 giochi non mi ha mai deluso perchè ha sempre puntato su una campagna ben strutturata e duratura, non come un buon numero di giochi che puntano tutto sul multiplayer lasciando campagne compresse e completabili in poche ore. Ho preso anche il season pass a 5€ e ho appena iniziato a giocare al dlc del quale per il momento l'unica cosa che mi ha stupito in senso negativo è la mancata localizzazione audio ma solo quella dei sottotitoli per il resto promette faville e ora scusate ma rapture mi attende ;)

BioShock Infinite is easily one of the most beautiful games I have played in a long time. Graphics wise, and story line. What people say, about connecting to characters such as Elizabeth, it is all true. The gameplay is just as fun, and Sky Lines were one of my favorite parts of the whole game. 10/10

Wonderful gameplay, I even loved most of the story, but the ending was stupid. There is so much that is good about this game, but it is so blatantly biggoted against everyone that is religious. As you find out more about the backstory of the main villain, you come to find out that the ONLY thing that made him become evil was becoming religious, and it unflinchingly portrays everyone who is religious as evil zealots committed to controling everyone in the name of their faith and murdering anyone who resists. If you are even slightly religious, I'd steer clear. If you're staunchly athiest, then this is the game for you.
badass game and the ending is so fucking confusing
XYNTA

Nun bin ich durch mit dem Spiel und bin begeistert. Besonders gegen Ende war ich besonderns gespannt. Das Finale des Spiels hat mich einfach fasziniert und war genial. Seit langem habe ich kein Spiel mehr in diesem Genre gespielt, das eine Story so gut erzählen konnte und dabei auch noch spielerisch sehr gut war. Kommen wir nun zu den Pro und Contras des Spiels:

Pro:
+ 10-13 Stunden Spielzeit
+ Packende Story
+ Gutes Waffenarsenal (persönlicher Favorit: Präzisionsgewehr)
+ Gute kleinere und größere Bosskämpfe
+ Einige verschiedene Gegnertypen
+ Elizabeth sucht Munition, Geld, Heilung und Salze und gibt eventuell Hinweise
+ Erkunden lohnt sich
+ Gutes Leveldesign
+ Einige abwechslungsreiche Missionen

Contra:
- Manche Missionen sind hingegen etwas in die Länge gezogen, was aber nicht weiter schlimm ist
- KI ist nicht immer perfekt, aber ausreichend gut
- Ein paar Waffen sind verhältnismäßig schlecht

Alles in allem bot mir Bioshock Infinte das klassiche Bioshock Feeling, gemixt mit etwas neuem. Einfach grandios!

Meine Wertung 91/100
